title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When attempting to create a new table group without setting a dataset in the table report item, an error is shown. According to the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation and the group dialog should still be shown in this scenario.
OB: An error is shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting a dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if no dataset is set.
SR:
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset.
3. Try creating a new table group.
